name: Google News Search
description: Searches Google News for headlines and articles via SerpAPI. Requires SERP_API_KEY in configuration.
author: YourTeam

query.description: Search terms to find news articles. Keywords separated by spaces, quotes for exact phrases

gl.description: Two-letter ISO country code for localized results (e.g., 'us', 'uk'). Default: based on IP

hl.description: Two-letter ISO language code for result content (e.g., 'en', 'es'). Default: 'en'

num_results.description: Maximum number of news articles to return (1-100). Default: 10

results.description: Array of news articles matching search criteria, ordered by relevance

snippet.description: Brief excerpt or summary of article content

query.description: Search query that was used to find these results
